explains: adj. 未出生的，未出世的；未诞生的；未来的

sentences.en: Maternal smoking can damage the unborn child.
sentences.cn: 母亲吸烟可能会伤害未出生的孩子。

sentences.en: Many factors can lead to growth retardation in unborn babies.
sentences.cn: 许多因素可以导致胎儿发育迟缓。

sentences.en: A lack of oxygen may inhibit brain development in the unborn child.
sentences.cn: 缺氧可能阻碍胎儿的大脑发育。
